name: Amazing Space Truck Parking
description: Amazing Space Truck Parking is the best space truck parking contest which needs your full attention. You will never see such an amazing and challenging exciting round.  Truck Parking  is made for those who love to play hard driving and tough parking simulation. You act as a driver of truck and set the modern luxury 4x4 truck of your guests without damaging the truck. Get ready for most marvelous sporty truck, sit behind the wheels. Make your precision good and land in your unique at right spot. Place your heavy trailer on the right location and increase your parking skills. Expert Truck Parking is one of the best and wonderful truck parking and driving 3D game. You will love to play this awesome and exciting match.
